item.title: How the ‘Platonic’ Creators Blew Up Their Plans for an Anthology Series
item.description: Halfway through filming the first season, Nicholas Stoller and Francesca Delbanco realized the chemistry between Seth Rogen and Rose Byrne was too good to give up.

item.title: Seth Rogen and Rose Byrne Will Make You Laugh Out Loud in ‘Platonic’ Season 2 Trailer
item.description: The friends (just friends) are back after too long of a wait.
